author: MSNBC.com
title: 'The path to the Supreme Court is unlikely at best'
description:
The Trump campaign’s election lawsuits in various key battleground states continue to be rejected in court putting President Trump’s wish to involve the Supreme Court in the 2020 election even further out of reach.

Host of MSNBC’s “American Voices” speaks wi…

author: MSNBC.com
title: Understanding how the new app “Parler” plays into disinformation and conspiracy theories
description: NBC News Reporter Ben Collins explains the social media platform “Parler” that's been increasing in popularity since the election, and why it’s concerning when it comes to spreading conspiracy theories and misinformation.
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Jon Ossoff: 'Black voters are the heart and soul of the Democratic electorate in Georgia and they can’t be taken for granted'
description: Host of MSNBC’s “American Voices” Alicia Menendez speaks with Jon Ossoff, Georgia’s Democratic nominee for U.S. Senate, about how he will keep voters energized and engaged as the state’s January 5th runoff election quickly approaches.
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: The psychology of Covid-19 stubbornness: why some American’s refuse to follow the rules
description: The CDC has issued a warning asking American’s not to travel this Thanksgiving as coronavirus cases surge across the nation. Despite warnings, mask mandates and other guidelines many still refuse to follow the rules. So what’s behind this psychology of stubbo…
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Trump urges state legislatures and courts to ‘flip’ results
description: As some Republicans including Chris Christie and Gov. Larry Hogan are calling on the Trump team to provide a peaceful transfer, others including Senate Majority Leader McConnell continue to  stand by. The Morning Joe panel discusses.
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: AstraZeneca says vaccine can be around 90 percent effective
description: AstraZeneca said on Monday that its Covid-19 vaccine could be up to 90 percent effective in preventing the disease — the third promising breakthrough in the fight against a pandemic that has killed nearly 1.4 million people worldwide.
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Biden team set to announce first Cabinet picks
description: Incoming White House chief of staff Ron Klain said Sunday that President-elect Joe Biden will begin announcing his Cabinet picks early this week. The panel discusses.
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: 'Cancel your plans' for Thanksgiving, says doctor as cases rise
description: The United States topped 12 million cases of Covid-19 on Saturday, as the third wave's uncontrolled spread prompted the CDC to urge Americans not to travel for Thanksgiving. Drs. Vin Gupta and Dave Campbell discuss.
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Trump campaign appeals Pennsylvania judge's decision to dismiss election lawsuit
description: President Trump’s team appealed a federal judge’s ruling to dismiss a lawsuit that invalidated millions of votes in the state of Pennsylvania, NBC’s Pete Williams reports.
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Trump threatens defense bill veto over renaming bases honoring Confederates
description: President Trump is threatening to veto a new defense spending bill that would include a provision to rename bases that honor Confederate generals. NBC's Carol Lee has details.
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: GSA head will go down as one the 'great obstructors' of our time: Columnist
description: LA Times columnist Virginia Heffernan says Emily Murphy, head of the General Services Administration, will go down as one of the great 'obstructors' of our time.
source.name: MSNBC

title: As G20 focuses on coronavirus pandemic, Trump plays golf
description: The weekend's developments offered fresh evidence that Trump doesn't want to do the job; he simply wants to have the job.

author: MSNBC.com
title: Gotcha: Trump's latest fundraising scam is a 'blatant attack on democracy'
description: Rev. Al Sharpton warns ardent Trump supporters of his dishonest schemes. The president's most recent swindle involves donations to a legal fund that can somehow overturn election results.

author: MSNBC.com
title: Lieutenant governors of Pennsylvania and Michigan discuss election certification process
description: Pennsylvania Lieutenant Governor John Fetterman and Michigan Lieutenant Governor Garlin Gilchrist join Katy Tur to discuss the court cases the Trump administration is pursuing and the process to certify election results in their states.
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: President-elect Biden names Alejandro Mayorkas for Homeland Security Chief
description: NBC News Justice correspondent Julia Ainsley reports on Biden’s nominee for Homeland Security, saying that Mayorkas has experience dealing with both refugee problems and outbreaks.

title: To protect Confederates' names, Trump eyes veto of military funding

title: President-elect Biden announces picks for top cabinet posts
description: With picks for Secretary of State, DHS and DNI, President-elect Biden turns to a experienced staff from across government.

author: MSNBC.com
title: Michigan certifies election results, making Biden's win official
description: The state of Michigan voted 3-0 to certify the election results, making President-elect Joe Biden's win there official and dealing a blow to President Trump's legal challenges. Nicolle Wallace discusses the breaking news with Eddie Glaude and A.B. Stoddard.
source.name: MSNBC

author: Steve Benen
title: With breakthrough Treasury nomination, Yellen gets last laugh
description: In ugly ways, Trump tried to turn Janet Yellen into a villain. In 2021, she'll return to public service as the nation's first woman Treasury secretary.
content:

author: MSNBC.com
title: Trump campaign formally requests a recount in Georgia
description: Georgia Gov. Brian Kemp (R) certified the state's results after a hand recount confirmed Joe Biden's win.
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Biden to nominate Janet Yellen for treasury secretary
description: NBC News confirms President-elect Joe Biden will nominate Janet Yellen for treasury secretary. She would be the first woman to hold that position. Previously, Yellen served as the chair of the Federal Reserve during the Obama administration.
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Trump administration backs down, officially acknowledges Biden transition
description: The General Services Administration now says it will allow transition from Trump administration to that of President-elect Joe Biden. President Donald Trump issued a tweet instructing his team to begin the transition process.
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Jon Meacham explains the way America can move on from Trump
description: Presidential historian Jon Meacham highlights the importance of collective responsibility and argues that the country needs to actively work to restore unity before Biden takes office
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Dr. Gupta: Traveling for Thanksgiving could pose the ‘deepest consequence’ of all
description: MSNBC public health contributor Dr. Vin Gupta urges viewers not to travel for Thanksgiving. He says it is ‘not worth the risk’, and gives advice on how to have a safe and socially distanced holiday
source.name: MSNBC

title: Eddie Glaude says America’s illiberal tendencies show ‘when it comes to Black voters’
description: Chair of the Department of African American studies at Princeton University Eddie Glaude and PBS NewsHour White House correspondent Yamiche Alcindor discuss the Trump Campaign’s fraud claims targeting hundreds of thousands of Black voters
